com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.dateline

Class GridLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.dateline.GridLine

  • public class GridLine
extends Object
    A class that combines a grid coordinate with the corresponding time point at the location. Additionally grid lines can be marked as the location where the summer time begins (daylight savings time) or ends.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.4 $
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    IDatelineModel.getGrid(int, int, boolean)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GridLine.DstChangeType
      An enumerator used to represent the two types of DST change that can happen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridLine(int location, long time)
      Constructs a new grid line.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GridLine.DstChangeType getDstChangeType()
      Determines the type of DST change represented by the grid line.
      int getLocation()
      Returns the location of the grid line (the x-coordinate).
      long getTime()
      Returns the time represented the grid line location

      Specifies whether the grid lines represents a time point where the daylight savings time changes.

        Constructs a new grid line.

      • getLocation

        public int getLocation()
        Returns the location of the grid line (the x-coordinate).
        Returns:
        the location of the grid line
        Since:
        1.0

      • getDstChangeType

        public GridLine.DstChangeType getDstChangeType()
        Determines the type of DST change represented by the grid line. A grid line can mark the point where the summer time changes to winter time, the winter time changes to summer time or no change occures at all.
        Returns:
        the type of DST change represented by the grid line
        Since:
        1.1

      • setDstChangeType

        public void setDstChangeType(GridLine.DstChangeType changeType)
        Specifies whether the grid lines represents a time point where the daylight savings time changes.
        Parameters:
        changeType - the type of change represented by the grid line (summer time to winter time, winter time to summer time, no change)
        Since:
        1.1

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
